tool_description: This API provides a lot of articles and informations about AI from popular newspapers like : thesun , theguardian , techmeme , techcrunch , etc...
name: AI News API
title: AI News API

api_list.name: Get individual newspaper
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the articles of a specific newspaper .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaper}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all AI News
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves avery article of a newspaper that we are providing .
